nodes.text: An Imperial base was located on the forest planet Kashyyyk. By 2 BBY, it was commanded by Ozzik Sturn. Located in a small canyon area, the base was circled by a cliff and a metal fence. The main part of the complex consisted of a small bunker with two levels. In 2 BBY, Galen Marek, Darth Vader's apprentice, stormed the base and slaughtered most of the Imperial troops stationed there.
